segments.text: Yes , madam , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have the medicine for that . I'll go and get it for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . oh , can you get me some orange juice as well ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . I'll be back right away .
segments.speaker: S1
